note.p: Burial: The antechapel of Caius College, Cambridge
Education: Studied medicine at Edinburgh; MB (1792) MD (1797) Caius College, Cambridge; DD

Career: Master of Caius College, Cambridge (from 1803); practised medicine; took Holy Orders (1811); given the Rectory of Cottenham, Cambridgeshire, by the Tory government (1827); Prebendary of Chichester (1832)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1839 No 40 pp 173-174
